text: illeogalodoe naegelo ola naega hananim-i geumgihasin geos-eul illeo julila geubunkke amugeosdo biyuhaji malmyeo geudaeui bumo-ege hyodohago ganan-eul gusillo neohui jason-eul salhae haji malla neohuiwa geudeul-eul wihaeseo hananim-i yangsig-eul julila ttohan na tananeun geosgwa natanaji anhneun joeag e gakkai haji malmyeo hananimkkeseo sinseongsihan saengmyeong-eul salhaehaji malla geugeos-i geubunkkeseo neohuiege myeonglyeonghayeo jihyeleul baeudolog han geos-inila
